welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ferry Pass, a charming city in the United States known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Pensacola International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Pensacola International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Pensacola NAS Airport.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal of Pensacola NAS Airport, used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
